column1: #Text=Polycrystalline samples of LiNi2(1-x)Zn2xP3O10 (0 ≤ x ≤ 0.15) and LiNi2(1-y)Cu2yP3O10 (0 ≤ y ≤ 0.05) were prepared following the conventional solid state reaction route from the starting materials Li2CO3 (99.999%, Alfa), NiO (99.998%, Alfa) and (NH4)2HPO4 (99.9%, Aldrich).
#Text=The stoichiometric mixture was ground thoroughly before being heated gradually to 3000C for 6 h followed by heating to 5000C for 6h.
#Text=The mixture was reground, pelletized and fired at 7000C for 36 h followed by regrinding and pelletization and firing at 7700C for 36 h.
#Text=The final product is found to be yellow in colour.
